Title: Deploy the Azure Monitor Agent to an Azure Arc-enabled Server
Summary: This Jumpstart Drop provides a step-by-step guide to deploy the Azure Monitor Agent to a Linux Arc-enabled server. It creates a Log Analytics Workspace and Data Collection rule to show typical performance counters and Syslog being collected.
